text: Oolite is a free videogame developed by Giles Williams and published by aegidian.org. ==Gameplay== In Oolite the player takes the role of a space trader, buying and selling goods at different space stations, and battling other space ships. Category:2004 video games Category:MacOS games Category:Linux games Category:Science fiction video games Category:Video game remakes Category:Windows games
title: Oolite (video game)
